name: 3rd person Horror Game
description:
______________ is a game im working on for the GB game Com.
______________ is a horror survival roguelike. the player roams through halls in search of people. completing jobs along the way to earn money and learn about the compound.

please leave ideas thoughts and bugs found in the comments

controls: 
when walking
A-D to move left or right
W moves foward 1 hall
S moves back one hall

J to enter search mode
Shift to open notes

when Searching
WASD to move courser
A to interact- this is a bit odd when interacting with doorways
B to cancel
